annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: EN
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Union
annotations.translation: 欧盟官方公报

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (11) Regulation (EC) No 1786/2003 provides for a series of checks to be carried out at each stage of the production process, including through exchanges with the integrated administration and control system provided for in Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003. Checks on the identification of the agricultural parcels concerned should therefore be coordinated with the checks carried out under that system.
annotations.translation: (11) (EC) 第 1786/2003 号条例规定，在生产过程的每个阶段都要进行一系列检查，包括与 (EC) 第 1782/2003 号条例中规定的综合管理和控制系统进行交流。因此，有关农业地块的识别检查应与在该系统下进行的检查相协调。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (19] The measures provided for in this Regulation are in accordance with the opinion of the Joint Management Committee for Cereals and Direct Payments,
annotations.translation: (19] 本条例规定的措施符合谷物和直接支付联合管理委员会的意见，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (12) As this scheme is referred to in Annex V to Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003, the competent authorities should carry out cross-checks on the agricultural parcels referred to in the contracts and/or delivery declarations and those declared by the producers in their single aid applications in order to prevent any unjustified aid being granted.
annotations.translation: (12) 由于本计划在 (EC) 第 1782/2003 号条例附件五中提及，主管机构应对合同和/或交货申报中提到的农业地块以及生产商在单一援助申请中申报的农业地块进行交叉检查，以防止给予任何不合理的援助。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (13) To ensure compliance with the conditions laid down by Regulation (EC) No 1786/2003 and by this Regulation, in particular as regards eligibility for the aid, certain reductions of and exclusions from the aid should be laid down in order to prevent any infringements, having regard to the principle of proportionality and the special problems resulting from cases of force majeure or from exceptional circumstances. Reductions and exclusions should be modulated according to the seriousness of the irregularity committed and should go as far as total exclusion from aid for a specified period.
annotations.translation: (13) 为确保符合 (EC) 第 1786/2003 号条例和本条例规定的条件，特别是关于获得援助的资格，应考虑到相称性原则以及不可抗力或特殊情况下产生的特殊问题，而对援助进行某些削减和除名，以防止任何违规行为。削减和除名应根据所犯违规行为的严重程度进行调整，直至在特定时期内完全除名。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (14) In order to ensure efficient management of the market in dried fodder, certain information must be notified to the Commission on a regular basis.
annotations.translation: (14) 为了确保干饲料市场的有效管理，必须定期向委员会通报某些信息。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (15) In order to prepare the report on the sector required in 2008 under Article 23 of Regulation (EC) No 1786/2003, notifications should be introduced in relation to forage areas and energy consumption in the production of dried fodder.
annotations.translation: (15) 为了准备 2008 年根据 (EC) 第 1786/2003 号条例第 23 条所要求的行业报告，应引入有关干饲料生产中的饲料面积和能耗的通知。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (16) In accordance with Article 21 of Regulation (EC) No 1786/2003, transitional measures should be adopted for stocks held on 31 March 2005.
annotations.translation: (16) 根据 (EC) 第 1786/2003 号条例第 21 条，应为 2005 年 3 月 31 日持有的库存采取过渡性措施。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (17] Where the optional transitional period provided for in Article 71 of Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003 is applied, the conditions of the aid referred to in that Article should be laid down.
annotations.translation: (17] 如果适用 (EC) 第 1782/2003 号条例第 71 条规定的任择过渡期，则应规定该条所述的援助条件。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (18) Regulation (EC) No 1786/2003 applies from 1 April 2005, the date on which the 2005/06 marketing year begins. This Regulation should therefore apply from the same date.
annotations.translation: (18) (EC) 第 1786/2003 号条例自 2005 年 4 月 1 日起适用，即自 2005/06 销售年度开始之日起。因此，本条例应自同一日期起适用。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: CHAPTER 1
annotations.translation: 第 1 章

annotations.label: Title
annotations.text: PURPOSE, DEFINITIONS AND CONDITIONS OF ELIGIBILITY FOR THE AID
annotations.translation: 援助的目的、定义和资格条件

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 1
annotations.translation: 第 1 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: This Regulation lays down detailed rules for the application of Regulation (EC) No 1786/2003 on the common organisation of the market in dried fodder.
annotations.translation: 本条例规定了适用关于干饲料市场共同组织的 (EC) 第 1786/2003 号条例的细则。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 2
annotations.translation: 第 2 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: For the purposes of this Regulation:
annotations.translation: 就本条例而言：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. 'dried fodder' means the products referred to in Article 1 of Regulation (EC) No 1786/2003, drawing a distinction between the following categories:
annotations.translation: 1. “干饲料”是指 (EC) 第 1786/2003 号条例第 1 条所述产品，须区分以下类别：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) 'dehydrated fodder', which means the artificially heat dried products referred to in the first and third subparagraphs of point (a) of that Article, including 'similar fodder products', in other words all artificially heat-dried herbage fodder products falling within CN code 1214 90 90 and in particular:
annotations.translation: (a) “脱水饲料”，指该条第 (a) 点第一和第三分段所述人工加热干燥产品，包括“类似饲料产品”，换言之，属于 CN 代码 1214 90 90 范围内的所有人工加热干燥的草本饲料产品，特别是：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: - herbage legumes,
annotations.translation: - 草本豆科植物，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: - herbage grasses,
annotations.translation: - 牧草，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: whole plants, harvested green with unripe grain, of the cereals listed in point I of Annex IX to Regulation (EC) No 1782/2003;
annotations.translation: (EC) 第 1782/2003 号条例附件九第一点所列谷物的整株，收获时为绿色且谷粒未成熟；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) 'sun-dried fodder', which means the products otherwise dried and ground referred to in the second and fourth indents of Article 1 (a) of Regulation (EC) No 1786/2003;
annotations.translation: (b) “晒干的饲料”，指 (EC) 第 1786/2003 号条例第 1(a) 条第二和第四分段所述以其他方式干燥和研磨的产品；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) 'protein concentrates', which means the products referred to in the first subparagraph of Article 1 (b) of Regulation (EC) No 1786/2003;
annotations.translation: (c) "浓缩蛋白"，指 (EC) 第 1786/2003 号条例第 1(b) 条第一分段所述产品；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (d) 'dehydrated products', which means the products referred to in the second subparagraph of Article 1 (b) of Regulation (EC) No 1786/2003;
annotations.translation: (d) “脱水产品”，指 (EC) 第 1786/2003 号条例第 1(b) 条第二分段所述产品；

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: HAS ADOPTED THIS REGULATION:
annotations.translation: 已通过以下条例：

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Purpose
annotations.translation: 目的

annotations.label: Section-header

annotations.translation: 定义
